document.full_text: leftist front-runner ollanta humala, seeking to shore up the crucial ethnic vote, on friday urged poor peruvians with indigenous roots to back him in sunday's presidential election.
document.title: leftist humala woos ethnic vote, widens lead in peru
lines_and_colors: leftist front-runner ollanta humala, seeking to shore up the crucial ethnic vote, on friday urged poor peruvians with indigenous roots to back him in sunday's presidential election.
